str_glob_spoints("test1.c:stc___0","test1.c:stc___0","test1.c:stc*").
str_spoints("call_static1",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0**").
str_spoints("call_static2",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0***").
str_spoints("call_var",s_func,fn_exit,"__arg0*","test1.c:stc*").
str_spoints("call_var",s_func,fn_exit,"__arg1*","test1.c:stc*").
str_spoints("call_var",s_func,fn_exit,"__arg1*","test1.c:stc___0*").
str_spoints("call_var",s_func,fn_exit,"test1.c:stc___0","__arg0**").
str_spoints("call_var",s_func,fn_exit,"test1.c:stc","__arg1**").
str_spoints("inter",s_func,fn_exit,"return","test1.c:stc2*").
str_spoints("inter",s_func,fn_exit,"return","test2.c:stc2*").
str_spoints("inter_var1",s_func,fn_exit,"return","test1.c:stc2*").
str_spoints("inter_var2",s_func,fn_exit,"return","test2.c:stc2*").
str_spoints("static_var1",s_func,fn_exit,"__arg0*","test1.c:stc*").
str_spoints("static_var1",s_func,fn_exit,"test1.c:stc","__arg1*").
str_spoints("static_var2",s_func,fn_exit,"__arg0*","test1.c:stc*").
str_spoints("static_var2",s_func,fn_exit,"__arg0*","test1.c:stc___0*").
str_spoints("static_var2",s_func,fn_exit,"test1.c:stc___0","__arg1*").
str_spoints("test1.c:static_fn",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0**").
str_spoints("test2.c:static_fn",s_func,fn_exit,"return","__arg0***").
